title: not enough????
body:
this guys was in my game and abused the team alot then after the game he added me just to say this to me lol
[1:59AM] _Name Removed_: you think you know more about the ban system than I do?
[1:59AM] RhysSupportsYou : the real question
is do i really care?
[2:00AM] _Name Removed_: ******* arab loving racist ****
you probably voted for trump
**** ******
[2:00AM] RhysSupportsYou : i live in nz?
i cant vote in united states elections
[2:00AM] _Name Removed_: so you didnt vote then?
******* degen ****
[2:01AM] RhysSupportsYou : are u thinking before u speak?
[2:01AM] _Name Removed_: only ******* retards dont supporrt our great republic
I am thinking everytime I type **** for brains
otherwise I coudlnt type if I no have a brain
got nothing to say to that?
you realised you are a no brain libtard cuck?
[2:03AM] RhysSupportsYou : do u know what u are talking about or not?
[2:03AM] _Name Removed_: what the **** are you saying?
******* typical incoherent libtard with no brain
cant understand a basic sentence
can you even understand what im saying enough to know how dumb you are?



get ride of this player pls

replies.body:
Don't accept trolls' and random mad men's friend request, they never have good thing to say, just don't accept it.

Did you report the guy after the game? If so then it's cool.

Just move on man, getting worked up over it means the troll has won.

> this guys was in my game and abused the team alot then after the game he added me just to say this to me lol

Then don't accept?

> [2:00AM] Name Removed: * arab loving racist **
you probably voted for trump

How does that work? LOL XD This guy has got to be trolling or something...
haha lol I had assumed that name was the creator of this post giving this toxic user a nickname rather than simply naming and shaming.

Lol i love how all the swears are fucking the bolding and whatnot.

Also no name and shame, prepare to have this deleted.
